original_text: For I say unto you, That unto every one which hath shall be given; and from him that hath not, even that he hath shall be taken away from him.
korean_text: 주인이 이르되 내가 너희에게 말하노니 무릇 있는 자는 받겠고 없는 자는 그 있는 것도 빼앗기리라

sentences.original_text: That unto every one which hath shall be given
and from him that hath not
even that he hath shall be taken away from him
